publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5872.3 Mary Scanlon: Factoring Servicesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5872) in the name of Patricia Ferguson, leave out from "for proposals" to end and insert "to debate proposals to require property factors to register and to make provision for an accessible form of dispute resolution between homeowners and property factors, and considers that an accreditation scheme should be given time to work before further legislation is considered."
